title: Homemade pumpkin pie
ingredients: ['For the filling', '500g (1 1/4 lb) pumpkin, cooked and pureed', '1 (410g) tin evaporated milk', '2 eggs, beaten', '175g (6 oz) dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'For the pastry', '350g (12 oz) plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '200g (7 oz) butter', '125ml (4 fl oz) cold water']
